content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: CreateScopeHostname path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scopes/{scope_id}/hostnames content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name scopeid
desc a scope id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum add a scope hostname
reqbody
cdncreatescopehostnamerequest
type obj
props
domain
type str
desc the hostname to add to a scope
disabletransparentmode
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not to add the hostname to a cdn sites cdn scope or its waf scope

when true this call adds the hostname to a cdn sites scope instead of loading from a cdn sites waf scope if the site has waf service
required true
responses
200
cdncreatescopehostnameresponse
type obj
cdnhostname
type obj
domain
type str
desc a hosts domain name
desc an individual hostname
desc the response from a request to add a hostname to a cdn site scope
title: 7_Configuration_CreateScopeHostname_36.json
